issue.message: Invalid package reference in org.jetbrains.kotlinx:kotlinx-coroutines-core-jvm; not included in Android: `java.lang.instrument`. Referenced from `kotlinx.coroutines.debug.AgentPremain`.
Call requires API level 23 (current min is 21): `android.view.View#setOnScrollChangeListener`
Redundant label can be removed
"ok" is usually capitalized as "OK"

The attribute `android:allowBackup` is deprecated from Android 12 and higher and may be removed in future versions. Consider adding the attribute `android:dataExtractionRules` specifying an `@xml` resource which configures cloud backups and device transfers on Android 12 and higher.
The log call Log.v(...) should be conditional: surround with `if (Log.isLoggable(...))` or `if (BuildConfig.DEBUG) { ... }`
